thread.title: Year Ender 2024: From Aditi Rao Hydari To Keerthy Suresh, 7 Popular Wedding Destinations Of Celebrity Weddings Of 2024
thread.title_full: Year Ender 2024: From Aditi Rao Hydari To Keerthy Suresh, 7 Popular Wedding Destinations Of Celebrity Weddings Of 2024

author: NDTV
title: Year Ender 2024: From Aditi Rao Hydari To Keerthy Suresh, 7 Popular Wedding Destinations Of Celebrity Weddings Of 2024
text:
Instagram/@pulkitsamrat
7 Stunning Celebrity Wedding Destinations Of 2024
Instagram/@aditiraohydari
From Udaipur to Telangana, 2024 was a year of beauty, marked by the magical weddings of Bollywood celebrities who tied the knot at some of these stunning destinations
Image Credit: Pexels
Celebrities like Taapsee Pannu, Ira Khan, and PV Sindhu got married in Udaipur, the City of Lakes, renowned for its rich royal ambiance, magnificent palaces, stunning lake views, and as a top romantic destination, making the weddings look even more glamorous
UDAIPUR
Image Credit: Pexels
Jaipur, another breathtaking destination, hosted weddings of celebrities like Aditi Rao Hydari and Surbhi Chandna amidst the stunning views of the Pink City, known for its beautiful spots that seamlessly blend royalty and modernity
JAIPUR
Image Credit: Pexels
Rakul Preet and Keerthy Suresh tied the knot this year in Goa, a destination known for its stunning beaches that provide the perfect sunset backdrop for a dream wedding, along with lush greenery that adds a serene and intimate touch to the celebration
GOA
Image Credit: Pexels
Another destination where Aditi Rao Hydari celebrated her South Indian wedding ceremony was Telangana, a place rich in South Indian culture, featuring royal palaces and offering delicious cuisine
TELANGANA
Instagram/@itcgrandbharat
Kriti Kharbanda and Pulkit Samrat celebrated their special bond in Manesar, located in Gurugram, where beautiful venues with grand and stunning designs, picturesque settings, and a wonderful ambiance made their celebration truly memorable
MANESAR
Image Credit: Pexels
Surbhi Jyoti tied the knot with Sumit Suri in the natural wonderland of Jim Corbett, where the unique landscape, stunning green views, fresh air, and serene surroundings make for the perfect backdrop for a dream wedding in the arms of nature
JIM CORBETT
Image Credit: Pexels
The picturesque Mediterranean landscape of the Amalfi Coast, served as the perfect setting for Amy Jackson's beautiful wedding with Ed Westwick, offering stunning views of mountains and hills that added to the charm of the celebration
AMALFI COAST
